text: An attachment may be issued upon a judgment either before or after or at the same time with a fieri facias. If costs are unnecessarily multiplied thereby they shall be charged to the party causing the attachment to be issued.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Attachment and Garnishment After Judgment in Aid of Execution. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Issuance of attachment after judgment; costs.
